Name: Elder Fashion
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of grapefruit zest twist.
POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass.
EXPRESS grapefruit zest twist over cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Spirit-forward and cleansing with gin, floral elderflower with zesty citrus.
History: Created by in 2007 by Phil Ward at Death & Co in New York City, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Elder Fashion contains 188 calories
